sentences.en: An Adam's apple is an anatomical structure which appears primarily in males.
sentences.cn: “亚当的苹果 ” 指的是主要出现在男性身体上的一种解剖学结构.

sentences.en: Anatomical data was obtained using 3 D - SPGR sequence to acquire high resolution.
sentences.cn: 3D-SPGR序列矢状位采集高分辨率解剖结构数据.

sentences.en: Atrial remodeling ( AR ) includes atrial electrical remodeling ( AER ) and atrial anatomical remodeling ( AAR ).
sentences.cn: 心房重构 ( AR ) 包括心房电重构 ( AER ) 和心房解剖重构 ( AAR ).

sentences.en: Comparative anatomical studies on the vessel elements of Chinese Magnolia and Michelia.
sentences.cn: 中国木兰属和含笑属导管分子的比较解剖.

sentences.en: New Anatomical Findings Regarding the Footprint of the Rotator Cuff.
sentences.cn: 旋转肌袖覆盖区解剖学上的新发现.

sentences.en: Objective : To provide anatomical basis for petrous pyramid through petrous presigmoid approach.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为经颞骨岩部乙状窦前入路颞骨岩部的磨除提供解剖依据.

sentences.en: Objective : To provide anatomical basis for resection of infant parotid gland hemangioma.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为婴幼儿腮腺血管瘤摘除术提供解剖学基础.

sentences.en: Objective To provide anatomical basis for repairing clinically the superficial palmar arch.
sentences.cn: 目的为手掌血管损伤时,修复掌浅弓提供解剖学基础.

sentences.en: Objective To provide anatomical evidence for clinical sacral canal injection.
sentences.cn: 目的为临床骶管注射提供解剖学依据.

sentences.en: Objective: To provide more anatomical basis for treatment of occipital neuralgia.
sentences.cn: 目的: 进一步为临床治疗头枕部疼痛提供解剖学基础.

sentences.en: Results The terminal crest was a invariablence anatomical structure of right atrium.
sentences.cn: 结果界嵴是右心房恒定的解剖结构,其浅层为横行纤维,深层为纵行纤维.

sentences.en: Some anatomical variations were identified and emphasized in this paper.
sentences.cn: 我们发现并且强调某些解剖学构造上的变异.

sentences.en: That was an anatomical model of the human body for use in teaching.
sentences.cn: 那是个用于教学的人体解剖模型。

sentences.en: The study or description of an anatomical region or part.
sentences.cn: 对嫌疑人的局部描述;局部崩溃;偏食;部分垄断;局部免疫性.

sentences.en: To cut apart or separate ( tissue ), especially for anatomical study.
sentences.cn: 解剖,把东西切开:把组织切割或分成 ( 小块 ), 尤指为了解剖研究.

words.tran_cn: 组织的；解剖学上的；结构上的
解剖的；解剖学的；结构上的

trans.tran_en: relating to the structure of human or animal bodies
